      • isGameExecutionUseful

        public boolean isGameExecutionUseful()
        Is it useful to perform a gameAction at the moment. An action is useful if it changes anything, otherwise it's just a waste of time and resources.
        Returns:
        if it's useful to perform a gameAction at the moment.

      • isGameResetUseful

        public boolean isGameResetUseful()
        Is it useful to perform a reset of the gameWorld at the moment. A reset of the gameWorld is useful if it changes anything, otherwise it's just a waste of time and resources.
        Returns:
        if it's useful to perform a reset of the gameWorld at the moment.
